description: Defines the ApiError class which extends the built-in Error class to include HTTP status code and an error code, used for representing API errors.

classes.name: ApiError
classes.description: Represents an operational API error with status and message, extending the Error class with additional properties.

methods.name: constructor(statusCode, message, errorCode = 'ERROR')
methods.description: Initializes a new ApiError instance with status code, message, and optional error code. Sets the error name to 'ApiError' and captures the stack trace.
